content: in the land of oz designed by adrienne fong where roos and peacocks reign supreme this elegant crescent shaped shawlette features a stockinette center and an easy to memorize peacock lace border to add a touch of fun best of all you can knit this with that special skein of sock yarn that is just too luscious for walking on inspired by tunie who loves all things peacock and debi who loves all things stockinette finished size 18 x 47 gauge 20 sts & 28 row/4 in stockinette materials 155 gm 380 yds fingering weight yarn us size 7 4 5mm needles us size 8 5 0mm needles for binding off stitch markers optional tapestry needle abbreviations yo yarn over ssk - slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as if to purl insert left needle through the front loops of the two slipped stitches and knit them together cdd central double decrease - slip 2 sts together as if to knit knit 1 st pass 2 slipped stitches over k2tog knit two stitches together notes shawl is worked from the center of the top down to the border with increases on the edges and at the center on the right side and increases on the edges only on the wrong side the first and last three stitches are always knitted to form a garter stitch edge for a larger shawl you may work more repeats of charts 2 and 3 charts are worked as follows chart 1 chart 2 1st time chart 3 1st time chart 2 2nd time chart 3 2nd time you will need more yarn if you want a larger shawl shawl may be knit with a different weight sample knit in socks that rock medium weight yarn with the appropriate change in needle used 370 yds 151gm size copyright 2010 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may photocopy instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com instructions chart 2 written instructions loosely cast-on 3 sts knit 6 row pick up 3 sts row 1 k3 edge sts yo k across to center st along garter stitch edge pick up and knit 3 sts from yo k1 center st yo k across to last 3 sts yo cast-on edge 9 sts k3 edge sts row 2 and all even row k3 yo p to last 3 set up row ws k3 edge sts yo p to last 3 sts sts ending with yo k3 yo k3 edge sts 11 sts row 3 k3 yo k3 k2tog yo * k1 yo 3 times ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 2 times yo row 1 rs k3 edge sts yo k2 yo k1 center repeat from * to 3 sts before center st k3 yo k1 st yo k2 yo k3 edge sts 15 sts center st yo k3 * yo k1 2 times yo ssk row 2 k3 yo p across to last 3 sts
